                                                                           Hex-Dump Conversion

National Governors Association


Victims Rights

N.G.A. Position:

       N.O.A. urges Congress to pass a Constitutional amendment guaranteeing victim's rights.

Clinton Administration Position:

       On June 6, 1996, President Clinton announced his support for a constitutional amendment
guaranteeing victims the right to be notified, to receive restitution, receive reasonable protection
measures, and to be heard at sentencing and parole hearings.



Dennis K. Burke     DPC/6-5568
January 24, 1997
